title: unna thavuna
sahitya:
unna tAvuna niyyadu vAna urumulaite venaka tiyyadu



caraNam 1



 sudi gAli oDa juTTi vADigAna lalitE goTTi

   

caraNam 2



 oDalO randhramu galigE I vanitala kevaru saligE

   

caraNam 3



 mati pOvu dAri janiramma apuDE mataminta valadaNTinamma

   

caraNam 4



 kanula kendu gAna rAdu gati kALindi manakinka mIdu

   

caraNam 5



 manamokkacO gUDarAdu praLayamuna nidhika vEru lEdu

   

caraNam 6



 rAja vadanulu rAramma tyAgarAja sakhuni jUDaramma
